ygData.subject: Re: Combat skills for mages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... if your near 40 and the cap is 60, and you are only level 10 I would suggest that you are doing quite well, considering skills can continue to rise at
ygData.messageBody:
>Ok, i have this big problem...I am a level 11 enchanter and my offense
>and defense skills arent even at (40) yet! (the cap is 60). I fight
>alot...with my staff...and still the skill just about never ever goes
>up. For example the offense, defense skill went up 1 number the whole
>time i was level 10.

if your near 40 and the cap is 60, and you are only level 10 I would
suggest that you are doing quite well, considering skills can continue to
rise at least until level 50
